trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> that holds the content of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> que detém o conteúdo de um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: An XpsDocument contains a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> that comprises one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements.
trans-unit.target: Um XpsDocument contém um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>que é composto por um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor is passed a reference to a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>construtor é transmitido uma referência a um <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>para escrever, armazenar e ler os elementos de conteúdo do documento.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is created by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Um novo vazio [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>é criada utilizando o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is opened by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Existente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>está aberta utilizando o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>raiz é adicionada à vazio [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, or on individual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements that are stored in the XpsDocument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>também podem ser associados elementos com informações de impressora e o controlo com o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, ou no indivíduo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>elementos que estão armazenados no XpsDocument.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence></xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Consulte XML Paper especificação (XPS) disponível para transferência em [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class with access to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe com acesso a uma determinada [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> e opções predefinidas de interleaving, recursos e compressão.

trans-unit.source: The target [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O destino [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] do pacote para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe que está contida numa determinada <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> com especificado opções predefinidas de interleaving, recursos e compressão.

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de destino para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: A opção de compressão de pacote.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe que está contida numa determinada <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> ficheiro com opções predefinidas de interleaving, recursos e compressão.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de ficheiro e caminho de destino <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de e/s de ficheiros no qual pretende abrir o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with the specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe que está contida numa determinada <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> com as opções de interleaving, recursos e compressão predefinido especificado.

trans-unit.source: The target package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O pacote de destino para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: A opção de compressão de pacote.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document as a string.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para o documento como uma cadeia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> classe que está contida numa determinada <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> ficheiro com opções predefinidas de interleaving, recursos e compressão.

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the target <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de ficheiro e caminho de destino <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The file I/O mode in which to open the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de e/s de ficheiros no qual pretende abrir o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: A opção de compressão de pacote.

trans-unit.source: Adds a root <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> to the package and returns a writer.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma raiz <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> para o pacote e devolve um escritor.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora esta classe utiliza um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um conjunto (sequência) de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] fixed-document sequence writer for this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] escritor de sequência de documento fixo para este <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a thumbnail image to the package.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma imagem em miniatura do pacote.

trans-unit.source: The format of the image.
trans-unit.target: O formato da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The newly added <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recentemente adicionado <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Closes the XPS document <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o documento XPS <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>foi aberto para acesso de escrita, os dados das memórias intermédias são escritas para o arquivo e o documento físico <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>está fechado.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: After Close has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Depois de ter sido chamado fechar, não existem partes do documento podem ser acedidas com esta <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Gets the core <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"></xref> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as principais <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"> </xref> do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: The core properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref><xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de núcleos do <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> for writing an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"> </xref> para escrever um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to write.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para escrita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> to use for writing the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"> </xref> a utilizar para escrever o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> and optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos que são utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões todos os recursos que são detidos por quaisquer objetos geridos que este <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref> para ler o documento.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora esta classe utiliza um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um conjunto (sequência) de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref> para ler o documento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fixed-document sequence at the root of the package.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a sequência de documento fixo na raiz do pacote.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora esta classe utiliza um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um conjunto (sequência) de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> of the package.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> do pacote.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is readable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o pacote é legível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package is readable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o pacote é legível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package can be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o pacote pode ser assinado digitalmente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package can be signed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o pacote pode ser assinado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is writable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o pacote é gravável.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package is writable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o pacote é gravável; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a signature from the package.
trans-unit.target: Elimina uma assinatura do pacote.

trans-unit.source: The signature that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura é eliminada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] assinaturas que estão associadas ao pacote.

trans-unit.source: The Signatures list identifies what parts are signed and whether the signatures are valid.
trans-unit.target: A lista de assinaturas identifica as partes tem sessão iniciadas e se as assinaturas são válidas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> objects that represent the signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> de <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> objetos que representam as assinaturas que estão associadas ao pacote.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Inicia um conjunto de partes do pacote com um certificado x.&509; especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` é `null`, é apresentada uma caixa de diálogo que permite ao utilizador selecionar um certificado x.&509; instalado, tal como um leitor de smart card.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; para utilizar na assinatura de cada parte; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para solicitar ao utilizador para selecionar um certificado instalado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para armazenar o certificado no pacote; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores que indicam que peças dependentes devem ser excluídas da assinatura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Inicia um conjunto de partes de pacotes através da utilização de um certificado x.&509; especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` é `null`, é apresentada uma caixa de diálogo que permite ao utilizador selecionar um certificado x.&509; instalado, tal como um leitor de smart card.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; para utilizar na assinatura de cada parte; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para solicitar ao utilizador para selecionar um certificado instalado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para armazenar o certificado no pacote; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts are excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores que indicam que peças dependentes foram excluídas de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] para atribuir a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Inicia um conjunto de partes do pacote com um certificado x.&509; especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box is presented that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: Se `certificate` é `null`, apresentada uma caixa de diálogo que permite ao utilizador selecionar um certificado x.&509; instalado, tal como um leitor de smart card.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if `certificate` is `null` and no certificates are installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>é emitida se `certificate` é `null` e não existem certificados estão instalados.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; para utilizar na assinatura de cada parte; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para solicitar ao utilizador para selecionar um certificado instalado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para armazenar o certificado no pacote; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts to exclude from the signing.
trans-unit.target: Sinalizadores que indicam que dependentes partes para excluir a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] para atribuir a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to verify that <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> before signing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para verificar se <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> antes de iniciar sessão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este membro suporta o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser utilizado diretamente a partir do seu código.

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o tipo seguro <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*>método em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] imagem em miniatura que estão associada com o documento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref> that represents the thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref> que representa a imagem em miniatura que estão associada com o documento.
